message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Import statement for 'org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*.
Abbreviation in name 'HostFromJSONListAdapterTest' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'parseJSON' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'METHOD_DEF' should be separated from previous statement.
